title: Flowers and Skulls - Novel Updates
tags: Death   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Late Romance   Oneshot   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Sickly Characters
author: Kei Natsuno   夏野けい
description:
After losing my job, I see a senior I once admired in a residential area on a weekday afternoon. She, Shiori Sakashima, has a disease that will kill her if she doesn't keep writing stories.
I want to publish her work while she's still alive. My proposal was accepted, and I began to live with her, her stories, and the flowers that nestled in her head. >
